snippet: As Ginger Grant on "Gilligan's Island," Tina Louise had a remarkable wardrobe, of course, it helped that the designer of her wardrobe was the great costume designer Nolan Miller, who died on Wednesday at the age of 79.
abstract: As Ginger Grant on "Gilligan's Island," Tina Louise had a remarkable wardrobe, of course, it helped that the designer of her wardrobe was the great costume designer Nolan Miller, who died on Wednesday at the age of 79.
